meanings.definition: A jointed or flexible device on which a door, gate, or lid swings as it opens and closes.
meanings.sent1: The rusty hinge creaked loudly as the door swung open.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to oil the hinges regularly to prevent them from squeaking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat liked to hide behind the door and jump out when it swung on the hinge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a well-oiled hinge, smoothly opening up her face to reveal joy.
meanings.sent5: The old wooden hinge, worn with time, held memories of countless comings and goings.

meanings.definition: To depend on or be contingent on.
meanings.sent1: His success will hinge on the outcome of the final exam.
meanings.sent2: The project's completion will hinge on securing additional funding.
meanings.sent3: The entire plan seemed to hinge on a single, risky decision.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship could hinge on a simple apology.
meanings.sent5: The fate of the mission would hinge on their ability to work together effectively.
